experiences.descriptions: Qingshan Group is an international Trading Company with a rapid pace of development and innovative solutions for demanding projects. I work as a full-stack developer here, responsible for building, deploying, and maintaining internal web applications. Create web applications through front-end and back-end programming. Integrate web applications and databases. Ensure applications security and ability to interact with multiple APIs and databases.Managed time-sensitive updates, including content changes and database upgrades. Use programming best practices to write and debug code. Collaborate with a team of web development professionals.

Design and create test plans test cases for each software release using advanced test design techniques. Report issues through a formal bug tracking system and work with the engineering team to help isolate debug resolve issues/bugs. Stay abreast of industry systems testing tools best practices. Clearly articulate and report on test progress results defects.

Maintain existing Laravel projects UI which have been developed previously. Develop web applications as guided by seniors. Work closely with the team lead. VitoSMS is a bulk SMS service provider supporting over 200 clients sending SMS 24/7.

Develop mogokroyaltreasure.com with PHP. Implement frontend with jQuery and Bootstrap. Review codes for other developers on GitHub. Develop web applications as guided by seniors and project managers. Work closely with the team lead and collaborate with the team.
